table_description: Azure Compute Virtual Machine Scale Set Network Interface

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name of the scale set network interface.

columns.name: scale_set_name
columns.description: Name of the scale set.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique ID identifying the resource in a subscription.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the network interface resource. Possible values include: 'Succeeded', 'Updating', 'Deleting', 'Failed'.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the resource in Azure.

columns.name: mac_address
columns.description: The MAC address of the network interface.

columns.name: enable_accelerated_networking
columns.description: If the network interface has accelerated networking enabled.

columns.name: enable_ip_forwarding
columns.description: Indicates whether IP forwarding is enabled on this network interface.

columns.name: primary
columns.description: Whether this is a primary network interface on a virtual machine.

columns.name: resource_guid
columns.description: The resource GUID property of the network interface resource.

columns.name: dns_settings
columns.description: The DNS settings in network interface.

columns.name: hosted_workloads
columns.description: A list of references to linked BareMetal resources.

columns.name: ip_configurations
columns.description: A list of IP configurations of the network interface.

columns.name: network_security_group
columns.description: The reference to the NetworkSecurityGroup resource.

columns.name: private_endpoint
columns.description: A reference to the private endpoint to which the network interface is linked.

columns.name: virtual_machine
columns.description: The reference to a virtual machine.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
